patthana23.1:2.1: Nakusalaṁ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṁ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.

patthana23.1:8.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
